definition: form (used in programming languages such as Visual Basic and Delphi to create a GUI window)

sentences.english: The system needs the coordinates of the minimized rectangle for the window.
sentences.chinese: 系統需要窗體的最小矩形框的座標。

sentences.english: Repaints a Form or control and refreshes any values.
sentences.chinese: 重新繪製窗體或控件並刷新任何值。

sentences.english: Once attached, the custom menu bar replaces the built-in menu bar for the form or report.
sentences.chinese: 附加的自定義菜單欄將替換窗體或報表的內置菜單欄。

sentences.english: Wa anted the background of the form for one of my projects to be translucent.
sentences.chinese: 要爲我的項目之一窗體的背景是半透明的。

sentences.english: Forms that are displayed modally are typically used as dialog boxes in an application.
sentences.chinese: 有模式顯示的窗體通常用作應用程序中的對話框。

sentences.english: If the form is paginated into several screens, each screen contains the footer.
sentences.chinese: 如果窗體被分頁爲多個屏幕，則每個屏幕都包含頁腳。

sentences.english: Changes the size, position, and Z order of a child, pop-up, or top-level window.
sentences.chinese: 主要用來顯示窗體的位置大小等。

sentences.english: This effectively has all your fields included on our form.
sentences.chinese: 此操作可以讓窗體有效地包括所有字段。

sentences.english: The Startup form appears automatically when you open Northwind.
sentences.chinese: 打開“羅斯文”數據庫時會自動顯示“啓動”窗體。

sentences.english: Horizontal and Vertical Scrolling Form E - This is a form with a horizontal and vertical scrollbar.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個窗體，帶有一個水平和垂直的滾動條。

sentences.english: The code page for the windows variant of the Latin1 character set.
sentences.chinese: 這一頁使用拉丁字符集定義了窗體變量。

sentences.english: The designer host is the nucleus of the forms designer.
sentences.chinese: 設計器宿主是窗體設計器的核心。

sentences.english: ListEntry Represents an item in a drop-down form field.
sentences.chinese: 代表了一個下拉型窗體字段項。

sentences.english: The forms designer infrastructure is built on top of services.
sentences.chinese: 窗體設計器基礎結構是在服務之上生成的。

sentences.english: Finally the design of the main form of the reviewing terminal is described.
sentences.chinese: 最後描述了閱卷終端主窗體的設計。
